pullRequest.title: Add Frontend CI Workflow
pullRequest.description:
This submission adds a new GitHub Actions workflow file at `.github/workflows/frontend-ci.yml` to automate the continuous integration process for the frontend application. The workflow is configured to run on pushes and pull requests to the `main` branch that involve changes in the `frontend/` directory. It uses Node.js 20, caches npm dependencies, and executes `npm ci`, `npm run lint`, `npm run build`, and `npm run test` to ensure code quality and correctness.

---

pullRequest.title: feat(frontend): Add QueryClient and QueryProvider
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces a centralized TanStack QueryClient configuration and a `QueryProvider` component. The `QueryClient` is configured with a `staleTime` of 60 seconds, `refetchOnWindowFocus` disabled, and a single retry attempt.

The `QueryProvider` is integrated into the application's entry point (`main.tsx`) to make the client available to all components. A unit test has been added to verify that the provider works as expected, and the necessary Vitest configuration has been added to support this.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [1055911693367477494](https://jules.google.com/task/1055911693367477494) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*

pullRequest.title: Refactor AuthContext for Consistency and Improved Error Handling
pullRequest.description:
This submission refactors the frontend authentication logic to improve consistency and robustness. The `AuthContext` now uses the generic `request` function from `api.ts`, which centralizes API call handling. It specifically addresses 401 Unauthorized errors by clearing the user's session and redirecting to the login page. The changes include removing the old `api.login` method, adding a comprehensive new test suite for the `AuthContext`, and updating the Vite configuration to ensure tests run correctly.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [7087191816726403280](https://jules.google.com/task/7087191816726403280) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*

pullRequest.title: Implement Global API Error Toasts
pullRequest.description:
This change enhances the frontend toast notification system to support success/error/info variants and typed API-error payloads. It listens for a custom `api:error` window event and shows a global error toast, improving user feedback on system-wide errors. The implementation includes refactoring the toast components for better maintainability, adding comprehensive tests, and ensuring all changes are type-safe and lint-free.
